sources.title: The Strange Mrs. Crane
sources.description: Title: The Strange Mrs. Crane Summary: Hoping to bury her criminal past, Jenny Hadley settles into a comfortable existence as Gina, the wife of the politician Clinton Crane. When her former associate Floyd Durant shows up to ... Directed by: Sam Newfield Actors: Marjorie Lord, Robert Shayne, Pierre Watkin Production Company: John Sutherland Productions Release Date: 1 December 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Hoping to bury her criminal past, Jenny Hadley settles into a comfortable existence as Gina, the wife of the politician Clinton Crane. When her former associate Floyd Durant shows up to blackmail Gina, she has no choice but to murder him. Things take a bizarre turn when Barbara Arnold is charged with Durant's murder and Gina is selected to serve on the jury.

sources.title: 1948 - The Strange Mrs. Crane - Sam Newfield

metadata.Plot: Hoping to bury her criminal past, Jenny Hadley settles into a comfortable existence as Gina, the wife of the politician Clinton Crane. When her former associate Floyd Durant shows up to blackmail Gina, she has no choice but to murder him. Things take a bizarre turn when Barbara Arnold is charged with Durant's murder and Gina is selected to serve on the jury.
metadata.Writer: Frank Burt, Robert Libott, Al Martin
metadata.Actors: Marjorie Lord, Robert Shayne, Pierre Watkin
